roadmap.title: Fundamentals of Blockchain Technology
roadmap.description: Gain a solid understanding of blockchain concepts, including distributed ledger technology, consensus mechanisms (Proof-of-Work, Proof-of-Stake), cryptography, smart contracts, and different blockchain platforms (Ethereum, Hyperledger Fabric, Corda).
resources: Books ("Blockchain Basics" by Daniel Drescher, "Mastering Bitcoin" by Andreas M. Antonopoulos)

roadmap.title: Programming Skills Enhancement
roadmap.description: Focus on learning programming languages relevant to blockchain development, such as Solidity (for Ethereum), JavaScript (for web3 development), Python (for scripting and data analysis), and Go (for building blockchain infrastructure).

roadmap.title: Smart Contract Development
roadmap.description: Deepen your knowledge of smart contract development. Learn how to write, deploy, and test smart contracts using Solidity and other relevant languages. Explore different development environments and frameworks (Truffle, Hardhat).
resources: Participate in hackathons and coding challenges

roadmap.title: Decentralized Application (dApp) Development
roadmap.description: Learn how to build user interfaces and integrate them with smart contracts to create functional dApps.  Explore front-end frameworks like React, Angular, or Vue.js and learn how to interact with blockchain networks using web3 libraries.
resources: Build and deploy your own dApp projects

roadmap.title: Blockchain Platforms and Tools
roadmap.description: Familiarize yourself with different blockchain platforms beyond Ethereum, such as Hyperledger Fabric, Corda, or Tezos. Explore blockchain-as-a-service (BaaS) platforms like Amazon Managed Blockchain or Azure Blockchain Service.
resources: Experiment with different platforms and tools

roadmap.title: Build a Portfolio and Network
roadmap.description: Develop a strong portfolio of blockchain projects to showcase your skills. Contribute to open-source blockchain projects. Network with other blockchain developers and attend industry events.

roadmap.title: Job Search and Continuous Learning
roadmap.description: Start applying for blockchain developer roles. Stay updated with the latest advancements in blockchain technology through continuous learning and development.
